name: World Wreckers
description:
This game is still in development. The downloadable demo contains four levels and was deemed quite addictive! :-D

Please donate to fund my development!

A fast paced arcade game, full of wanton urban destruction. Inspired by countless block breaker games but attempting to break [sic!] their mold with a modern twist.

World Wreckers sees you in the role of a deconstruction worker, working for a large mining conglomerate. 

Several towns need to be razed, to make space for a new open-cast coal mine, because don't we all need more coal? At least our shareholders do! 

Anyway, your trusty wrecking machine will get the job done, by firing a massive, but elastic, projectile. This ball of destruction can rebound off your vehicle's armored sides as well as off buildings, effectively blowing them apart in the process!

Next development step: Flying debris! And of course more levels!
Please leave comments and report any bugs and suggestions to lea.creative.industries@gmail.com
